title: error code 003 cant patch
body:
"somethings up with our servers and its preventing you from patching"
what can i do? this messege comes up every time for last hour or so.

replies.body: Not really sure what's causing this just yet, but it might be some kind of dropped connection.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch might fix this up.  If not then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.
